title: When did mundo fall out of the meta ?
body: I still think mundo is a kickass jungler, but it seems the most important thing now is for junglers to snowball their teams and fighter/assassin type junglers do it much better. Also they clear jungle much faster. Can mundo make a comeback?

replies.body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PzDUt-O217M

This one kinda goes over why he isn't meta from memory and explains the kind of champ he is.

If you don't want to watch that, basically mundo is a Value champion, and he wins games by multiplying health Value to rediculous amounts, and then just brute forces things with his huge amount of health, the problem with him now is we just went through a meta with the korean build ({{item:3142}} {{item:3071}} ) and people have actually learned "Oh pen items are useful vs tanks" and tanks are rather strongly falling out, and Mundo is part of the group.
Penetration items are less useful against raw health though.
Not really, as building health ends up building resists quite hard, and mundo is very vulnerable to kiting, and has to go for longer fights.

To add what others have said, another reason Dr Mundo isn't as valuable as other tank junglers like Gragas and Reksai (or even Sejuani) is because he lacks the ability to make game changing ganks and plays. Most meta junglers have a strong cc ability that allow them to do just that and while cleaver can pin someone down it's not in the same ballpark as these other picks.

>
>Can mundo make a comeback?

Lets hope not.

> I still think mundo is a kickass jungler

Why u are bronze 5.
